Frequently Asked Questions

Find answers to common questions about providing feedback

How will my feedback be used?

Your feedback helps us identify areas for improvement and prioritize new features. We review all submissions and use them to make informed decisions about product development.

Can I submit feedback anonymously?

Yes, the contact information section is optional. If you prefer to remain anonymous, simply leave those fields blank.

When can I expect a response?

While we review all feedback, we may not be able to respond to every submission individually. If you provide contact information and request a follow-up, we'll try to respond within 5-7 business days.

Can I attach files to my feedback?

Currently, our feedback form doesn't support file attachments. If you have screenshots or documents you'd like to share, please mention that in your feedback and we may follow up to request them.
